      • InitGameMode

        public void InitGameMode​(boolean newVsPlayer,
                         boolean newPlayerOneIsWhite,
                         boolean newSimpleAi)
        initializing the game mode options
        Parameters:
        newVsPlayer - true if game mode pvp, false if opponent is ai
        newPlayerOneIsWhite - true if player 1 is white, false if player 1 is black (Player 2 = Ai if player picked Ai as a Opponent)
        newSimpleAi - true if Ai is simple, false if Ai is minmax AI
